basics.name: Anonymous
basics.label: Finance Manager
basics.summary: Ability to communicate effectively to customers, management and staff. Establish rapport with clients from diverse socio-economic and ethnic backgrounds. Ability to deal with crisis in a calm, professional manner.

work.name: Lasco Ford
work.summary: As the lead finance manager my responsibilities were numerous including representing the dealership and abiding by all legal and ethical guidelines under Federal Law.

work.name: Al Serra Buick/GMC
work.summary: I assisted customers with their New vehicle purchase/Lease with excellent counseling and product knowledge. I maintained a Customer Survey Index CSI of 100%.

work.name: LaFontaine Auto Group
work.summary: I assisted customers with purchase/lease of a new or pre-owned vehicle, by maintaining the knowledge of the current purchase/lease options offered by the manufacture.

work.name: Bill Fox Chevrolet
work.summary: I assisted customers with their vehicle purchase/lease. Through excellent counseling and product knowledge.

work.name: Expressway Ford
work.summary: I managed the used car inventory to include; appraisal's, auction purchases and sales, wholesale, deal desking, ongoing sales training, and the daily responsibilities of a Used Car Manager.

work.name: Unknown Company
work.summary: I was responsible for the inventory of both locations with a total of approximately 200 units and maintained the daily functions of the store.

work.name: Albert Chevrolet
work.summary: I assisted customers with their vehicle purchase/lease needs through excellent counseling and kept updated knowledge of current rebate availability as well as product knowledge.

work.name: United States Air Force
work.summary: I assembled, disassembled and maintained non-nuclear tactical weaponry.
